info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:02AM EDT until August 13 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...BUCKS AND NORTHEASTERN PHILADELPHIA COUNTIES... At 101 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Quakertown to Chalfont to near East Norriton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Bensalem, Ewing, Lansdale, Quakertown, Perkasie, Doylestown, Byram, Hatboro, Souderton, Bedminster, Ambler, Chalfont, Tinicum, Hatfield, New Hope, Yardley, Newtown, Dublin and Langhorne. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 340 and 355. Northeast Extension between mile markers 24 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
